import React from 'react' import PropTypes from 'prop-types' import {connect} from 'react-redux' import {Link} from 'react-router-dom' import Moment from 'react-moment' const PostItem = ({auth , post: { _id , text , name , avatar , user , likes , comments , date }}) => { return (

{name}

{text}

Posted on {date}

Discussion {comments.length > 0 && { {comments.length}}} {!auth.loading && user === auth.user._id && ( )}
) } PostItem.propTypes = { post: PropTypes.object.isRequired, auth: PropTypes.object.isRequired } const mapStateToProps = state => ({ auth: state.auth }) export default connect(mapStateToProps , {})(PostItem)
